itunes:title: MONEY WITH MICHELLE: The Big Picture of Money Management
title: MONEY WITH MICHELLE: The Big Picture of Money Management
description: Money with Michelle aka Tim Draper is the sleeper hit of the Just Z podcast and we couldn't be more excited to welcome Michelle back to talk all about the big picture of Money Management. Spending less than you make, automation, investing 101, and where to even start are just a few of the nuggets of wisdom that Michelle has shared with us. And today he's talking about limited income, building an emergency fund, investing, why buying a brand new car is a bad idea, and everything in between!
